headline: Is United Airlines a Bargain After Recent 7% Drop and International Expansion News?
summary: Wondering if United Airlines Holdings is a real bargain or just flying high? You are not alone, as many curious investors are eyeing its current value. The stock price has been on a bumpy ride lately, dropping 7.3% over the last week and 10.0% in the past month, but still boasting gains of over 97% in five years. Recent headlines about industry-wide fuel cost pressures and shifting consumer travel trends have contributed to these moves, especially as airlines adjust to post-pandemic demand...
